abstract: Carl Icahn said on Tuesday he will appeal a court ruling upholding a swap transaction by Lions Gate Entertainment that he claims hindered his hostile takeover bid for the studio, Reuters reported.
snippet: Carl Icahn said on Tuesday he will appeal a court ruling upholding a swap transaction by Lions Gate Entertainment that he claims hindered his hostile takeover bid for the studio, Reuters reported.
lead_paragraph: Carl C. Icahn says he will appeal a court ruling upholding a swap transaction by Lions Gate Entertainment that he claims hindered his hostile takeover bid for the studio, Reuters reported.

headline.main: Icahn Fires Back At Lions Gate in Legal Battles
